languages.text: {n}Отряды блюстителей, усиленные Адептус Арбитес, вручили обеим сторонам конфликта кодексы с законами Императора. Те немногие, что осмелились воспротивиться насаждению Лекса, были казнены на месте, а Экклезиархия и малые культы склонили головы и прекратили борьбу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Отряды блюстителей, усиленные Адептус Арбитес, вручили обеим сторонам конфликта кодексы с законами Императора. Те немногие, что осмелились воспротивиться насаждению Лекса, были казнены на месте, а Экклезиархия и малые культы склонили головы и прекратили борьбу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Отряды блюстителей, усиленные Адептус Арбитес, вручили обеим сторонам конфликта кодексы с законами Императора. Те немногие, что осмелились воспротивиться насаждению Лекса, были казнены на месте, а Экклезиархия и малые культы склонили головы и прекратили борьбу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the laws of the Emperor. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

{n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the laws of the Emperor. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

{n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

{n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adeptus Arbites'in desteklediği infazcı mangaları, çatışan iki tarafa da İmparator'un Yasası'nı içeren kodlar verdi. Lex'e karşı çıkma cüreti gösteren az sayıdaki kişiler özetle idam edildi ve Ekleşiarşi ile küçük tarikatlar, boyun eğerek savaşmayı bıraktı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adeptus Arbites'in desteklediği infazcı mangaları, çatışan iki tarafa da İmparator'un Yasası'nı içeren kodlar verdi. Lex'e karşı çıkma cüreti gösteren az sayıdaki kişiler özetle idam edildi ve Ekleşiarşi ile küçük tarikatlar, boyun eğerek savaşmayı bıraktı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des escouades de prévôts, soutenues par l'Adeptus Arbites, ont remis aux deux camps du conflit des codes contenant la loi de l'Empereur. Après que les quelques réfractaires à l'imposition de la Lex ont été sommairement exécutés, l'Ecclésiarchie et les sectes mineures ont docilement déposé les armes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des escouades de prévôts, soutenues par l'Adeptus Arbites, ont remis aux deux camps du conflit des codes contenant la loi de l'Empereur. Après que les quelques réfractaires à l'imposition de la Lex ont été sommairement exécutés, l'Ecclésiarchie et les sectes mineures ont docilement déposé les armes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}高等裁定局の支援を受け執行官の隊が、対立する両陣営に対し皇帝の法を記した法典を提示した。レックスの施行に抵抗することを敢えて選んだ者たちは即座に処刑され、帝国聖教会および小規模なカルトは頭を垂れて戦いを止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}高等裁定局の支援を受け執行官の隊が、対立する両陣営に対し皇帝の法を記した法典を提示した。レックスの施行に抵抗することを敢えて選んだ者たちは即座に処刑され、帝国聖教会および小規模なカルトは頭を垂れて戦いを止めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在帝国法务部的支持下，许多执法者小队向发生冲突的双方宣读了帝皇法典的法律条款。少数胆敢反对帝国律法的人遭到就地处决，国教与其他小型教派绝大部分神职人员低下了头，停止了纠纷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在帝国法务部的支持下，许多执法者小队向发生冲突的双方宣读了帝皇法典的法律条款。少数胆敢反对帝国律法的人遭到就地处决，国教与其他小型教派绝大部分神职人员低下了头，停止了纠纷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unidades de seguridad, con apoyo del Adeptus Arbites, entregaron a ambas partes del conflicto una serie de códices que contenían la ley del Emperador. Los pocos que se opusieron a la imposición de la Lex recibieron una ejecución sumaria, y la Eclesiarquía y los cultos menores se inclinaron y dejaron de luchar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unidades de seguridad, con apoyo del Adeptus Arbites, entregaron a ambas partes del conflicto una serie de códices que contenían la ley del Emperador. Los pocos que se opusieron a la imposición de la Lex recibieron una ejecución sumaria, y la Eclesiarquía y los cultos menores se inclinaron y dejaron de luchar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Von den Adeptus Arbites unterstützte Trupps von Enforcern haben beiden Seiten des Konfliktes Codes mit den Gesetzen des Imperators übergeben. Die wenigen, die es wagten, sich der Auferlegung des Lex zu widersetzen, wurden kurzerhand exekutiert, während die Ekklesiarchie und die niederen Kulte ihre Köpfe senkten und den Kampf einstellten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Squads of enforcers, supported by the Adeptus Arbites, presented both sides of the conflict with codes containing the Emperor's Law. The few who dared to oppose the imposition of the Lex were summarily executed, and the Ecclesiarchy and the minor cults bowed their heads and ceased fighting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Von den Adeptus Arbites unterstützte Trupps von Enforcern haben beiden Seiten des Konfliktes Codes mit den Gesetzen des Imperators übergeben. Die wenigen, die es wagten, sich der Auferlegung des Lex zu widersetzen, wurden kurzerhand exekutiert, während die Ekklesiarchie und die niederen Kulte ihre Köpfe senkten und den Kampf einstellten.{/n}
